__This notebook contains the data pre-processing and data splitting procedures for the tree cover type data set.__

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(caret)
set.seed(0)
```

```{r}
df = read.csv("C:/Users/andre/OneDrive/Desktop/ADS503/covtype.csv")
head(df)
```

```{r}
str(df)
```

```{r}
summary(df)
```

```{r}
# Remove features/predictors with no variance
zero_cols <- nearZeroVar(df)
Zero_covtype <- df[, -zero_cols]
```

```{r}
# Remove missing (NA) variables
Df <- df[!is.na(df)]
```

```{r}
# Split the data into training and testing sets (80% and 20%).
cov_train <- createDataPartition(df, p = 0.8, list = FALSE)

covtype_train <- Covtype[cov_train$Resample1, ]
covtype_test <- Covtype[-cov_train$Resample1, ]
```
